body:
I've seen this a couple times on CI, reproducing locally too:

It seems only happening for `RetryStreamingReset`.

```
[ RUN      ] Protocols/ProtocolIntegrationTest.RetryStreamingReset/IPv6_Http2Downstream_Http2Upstream
[2020-06-19 08:27:04.324][313375][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:104] Caught Segmentation fault, suspect faulting address 0xba2a018
[2020-06-19 08:27:04.324][313375][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:91] Backtrace (use tools/stack_decode.py to get line numbers):
```

title: //test/integration:protocol_integration_test is flaky
